text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Lac | native_name = البحيرة | native_name_lang = ar | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = Lac Yoa2.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = The shore of Lake Chad on the coast of the Lac region | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Map of Lac Region.jpg | mapsize = 200px | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Chad showing Lac. | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Chad | subdivision_type1 = Departments | subdivision_type2 = Sub-prefectures | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name1 = 2 | subdivision_name2 = 8 | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Regional capital | seat = Bol | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_total = 451369 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_footnotes = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = | area_code_type = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Lac is one of the 23 regions of Chad. Its capital is Bol. The region includes Chad's portion of the shore of Lake Chad. The region of Lac is divided into two departments - Mamdi (capital Bol) and Wayi (capital Ngouri). ==Economy== The region is the main agricultural segment in the whole country. They produce cotton and groundnut, the two main cashcrops of the country. There are a variety of local crops, like rice, also grown in the region. ==References== Category:Regions of Chad
title: Lac (region)
